formatted_address: 1 Stadium Pl, #01 - 56 Kallang Wave Mall, Singapore 397628
name: Starbucks Kallang Wave Mall

reviews.text: Delightful and warm bagel, what made it even better was that it came with butter, cream cheese and jam. However, I did notice that the cafe was a bit warmer than expected and it seemed like the AC wasn't quite doing its job. Nonetheless, I appreciated the fact that it wasn't overly crowded, allowing me to unwind and relax after a hectic day.

Barista was quite rude when we asked a question regarding a voucher. Not recommended if you want to spend time here for a long time. The place was not even crowded, not sure why they want to chase us out and even threatened to call police even though we left our things there for 30mins and came back for it.  Is this how you speak to customers?

Starbucks is always a nice place for a coffee and delicious bite. But avoid this Starbucks (at Kallang Wave Mall) in the early hours of the morning as the mall Aircon does not kick in until 9 plus. Before that it was really warm. And not because I had a nice warm yummy Beef Pot Pie...

It's a Starbucks! Outlet is situated within Kallang Wave mall (Singapore National Stadium) near L1 main entrance. Sits appoximately 30 pax (Covid situation). Fully airconditioned. Crews were great and drinks turned out to be good.
It is pleasant to have coffee here. However, the only disadvantage is that they do not provide enough power plugs at each table.
